title: Healthy Snacks
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 32 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: What kinds of snacks are good for you? Healthy Snacks provides students a glimpse of a few healthy snacks from fruits and vegetables to nuts and more! Vibrant photographs and a repetitive text pattern will support early readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to classify information and how to identify and use nouns.
meta: celery, cereal, cheese, healthy, seeds, snacks
Classify Information : Classify information in text
Initial and Final Sounds : Discriminate initial consonant /s/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words be and can

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
